titleStmt.title: Willis D. Collins to James F. Robinson
CWG7844

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1862-1863

body.p:
Paris Ky Nov 1. 1862.
To his Excellency
James F. Robinson
Governor of Ky
I tender my resignation as Justice of the Peace for Bourbon County in the Ruddells Mills Precinct or District No 8. and recommend Geo W. Wyatt Sr as a suitable person to fill said office
We concur in the recommendation above

R. J Brown clk B Co
Wm M. Samuel P J B C

Bourbon Co
J.P. Dist 8.
App made
Geo W Wyatt Sr
Jany 2. 1863
